name: Keep Me Alive (Xenation, Ludovic Valle, GaLou0, Narffy)
name_original: Keep Me Alive (Xenation, Ludovic Valle, GaLou0, Narffy)
description:
Make the right choices to survive in your second chance at life

After god made a mistake, you died! Thankfully, as an apology, he gives a you a few more chances to live a long life. You now have three more chances at life. As you get thrown into someone else's life, your choices will decide how long you survive. How long will you be able to live in each of your wacky new lives?

Controls:

- Move: A/D OR Q/D OR Left/Right

- Interact: Left Click

- Answer Yes: Drag Card Right

- Answer No: Drag Card Left
